Interface BeanInjector

    SpringBeanInjector

    public interface BeanInjector
    The Interface BeanInjector.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MobiBeanDefinition addDependencies(MobiBeanDefinition beanDefinition, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context)
      Adds the dependencies taking out them from context, and subsequently, add them to cdiBeans beanDefinition field.
      <CONFIG_CLASS extends com.mobiground.ecap.configuration.Configuration> 
      java.util.List<MobiBeanDefinition>      		 getBeanDefinition(CONFIG_CLASS configurationInstance)
      Gets the bean definition, this method iterate over configuration instance, and gets all method that comply
      the Spring '@Bean' bean declaration, also gets all method parameter and adds to List of Dependency of
      beanDefinition, sets the factoryMethod which will be responsible of instantiate the corresponding bean in
      postProcessFactory Example: Given a method like this: Public Object getObject(String text){ return new Object(text); }

      • getBeanDefinition

        <CONFIG_CLASS extends com.mobiground.ecap.configuration.Configuration> java.util.List<MobiBeanDefinition> getBeanDefinition(CONFIG_CLASS configurationInstance)
        Gets the bean definition, this method iterate over configuration instance, and gets all method that comply
        the Spring '@Bean' bean declaration, also gets all method parameter and adds to List of Dependency of
        beanDefinition, sets the factoryMethod which will be responsible of instantiate the corresponding bean in
        postProcessFactory Example: Given a method like this: 
                        Public Object getObject(String text){
                        return new Object(text);
                }
        Type Parameters:
        CONFIG_CLASS - the generic type
        Parameters:
        configurationInstance - the configuration instance
        Returns:
        the bean definition

      • addDependencies

        MobiBeanDefinition addDependencies(MobiBeanDefinition beanDefinition,
                                 org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context)
        Adds the dependencies taking out them from context, and subsequently, add them to cdiBeans beanDefinition field. If configuration instance has prefix, this method will pick up all beans of parameter factory method type and it chooses the appropriate bean, In case of prefix has not value, but the context has more than matched class, the method would choose non prefixed bean.
        Parameters:
        beanDefinition - the bean definition
        context - the context
        Returns:
        the mobi bean definition
